message: @all Just pushed up a semi-complete Teams class (tests are passing now). I'm going to try and finalize it a bit more and then start on the Ratings class next I think (since the Teams class depends on it).

I also created a new Students class and moved the implementations of those related methods into it to slim GradesDB down a bit (since we can't completely remove the methods in GradesDB, I've modified them so they call the methods in the new Students class now).
Just pushed up an implemented Ratings class (still need to tie it into the Teams class though). Tests should be passing.

Pushed up another commit (I tied the Ratings class to the Teams class and also populated each Student object with its associated Teams). I also fixed a few tests...all of them are pretty much passing at this point except for the Assignments related ones...I should be able to work on and finish up the Assignments class before heading to bed tonight.
I noticed a lot of the GradesDB stuff got commented out.  Anything you need me to work on right now?

@TonyPotter I left the commented stuff in for now (earlier I was borrowing a few snippets here and there, but I don't think I've had to use any of it the last few hours so I'll probably go ahead and clear it out pretty soon to clean things up). At the moment I'm happy to continue working on the Assignments class...I think once it's done there'll probably just be a few additional methods I saw in the Students class which I haven't taken a close look at yet that haven't been implemented that should more or less wrap things up. Once I'm done tonight I'll be pretty much offline tomorrow so I'm thinking the main things to work on at that point would be the extra credit related stuff for this final Deliverable and reviewing everything again for accuracy, cleaning things up, etc.

Tomorrow we'll be heading out to go watch the Ninja Turtles movie and hang out for a few hours so I probably won't be back at my desk until tomorrow evening, but I'll do my best to keep track of any conversations that crop up during the day ;-)
